com.glmapview

Class GLMapManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glmapview.GLMapManager

  • public class GLMapManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton object that manages offline maps

      • GLMapManager

        public GLMapManager()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static boolean initialize(android.content.Context context,
                                 java.lang.String apiKey,
                                 ProgressCallback progressCallback)
        Initializes GLMapManager

        During first initialization it copies world map file from app resources to cache directory. Framework uses progressCallback to notify about initialization(copying) progress

        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        apiKey - API key of this application
        progressCallback - initialization progress callback
        Returns:
        true if initialized successfully

      • setCachesDir

        public static void setCachesDir(java.lang.String val)
        Sets location of caches before initialization. By default caches are set to getFilesDir() of context passed to initialize function, or getExternalFilesDir(null) if external storage is mounted.
        Parameters:
        val - location of caches dir

      • RemoveMap

        public static void RemoveMap(GLMapInfo map)
        Delete map
        Parameters:
        map - map to delete
        See Also:
        GLMapInfo.getMapID()

      • updateMapList

        public static void updateMapList(android.content.Context context,
                                 java.lang.Runnable complete)
        Updates map list from server
        Parameters:
        context - the Context where map list will be cached
        complete - runnable, called when map update is complete

      • updateDownloadedMaps

        public static void updateDownloadedMaps(android.content.Context context,
                                        java.util.List<java.io.File> customDirs)
        Updates location of downloaded maps from default locations and optionally given directories
        Parameters:
        context - the Context used to find default map locations
        customDirs - Array of custom paths of maps

      • removeStateListener

        Removes listener added by addStateListener
        Parameters:
        val - Listener to remove
        See Also:
        addStateListener(StateListener)

      • addStateListener

        public static void addStateListener(GLMapManager.StateListener listener)
        Subscribes listener to events about map downloading progress.

        Event name is sent via fieldName
        finished 0 at start, 1 at end of task
        progressDownload sent each time when download progress is changed.

        
 task.addListener(new FieldListener(){
        public void fieldValueChanged(Object obj, String fieldName, Object newValue){
                ((MapsAdapter)listView.getAdapter()).notifyDataSetChanged();
        }
 });
        Parameters:
        listener - that will receive events
        See Also:
        removeStateListener(StateListener)

      • getMapDownloadTasks

        public static java.util.List<GLMapDownloadTask> getMapDownloadTasks()
        Returns:
        Returns the list of created and not finished map download tasks

        public static GLMapDownloadTask getDownloadTask(GLMapInfo mapInfo)

        Parameters:

      • AddMap

        public static boolean AddMap(android.content.res.AssetManager mng,
                             java.lang.String assetFileName,
                             ProgressCallback progressCallback)
        Adds vector map. Could be used for maps embed into the app resources.
        Parameters:
        mng - AssetManager where custom map is located
        assetFileName - name of custom map
        progressCallback - callback to track progress of custom map caching
        Returns:
        true if success

      • RemoveMap

        public static void RemoveMap(java.lang.String fileName)
        Removes vector map from map manager. When removed is safe to delete cached map file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of custom map

      • MapAtPoint

        public static GLMapInfo MapAtPoint(MapPoint point)
        Returns mapID of vector map that contains given point. If there is no maps that contains given point null is returned.
        Parameters:
        point - point that vector map must contain
        Returns:
        mapID of vector map or null

      • FindNearestMap

        public static GLMapInfo FindNearestMap(GLMapInfo[] maps,
                                       MapPoint point)
        Helper function that iterates over maps param and returns closest GLMapInfo to the given point.
        Parameters:
        maps - array of map objects
        point - point that vector map must contain
        Returns:
        mapID of vector map

      • DistanceToMap

        public static double DistanceToMap(GLMapInfo map,
                                   MapPoint point)
        Calculates distance from the map to the point
        Parameters:
        map - map object
        point - some point
        Returns:
        Measured distance in internal units

      • SortMaps

        public static void SortMaps(GLMapInfo[] maps,
                            MapPoint point)
        Sorts array of GLMapInfo by distance from given point
        Parameters:
        maps - array of map objects
        point - center from where distance is calculated

      • SetAllowedTileDownload

        public static void SetAllowedTileDownload(boolean val)
        Allows GLMapManager to download single tiles when downloaded vector maps does not contain data.
        Parameters:
        val - true to enable tile downloading
